# RocNest

> Free sports equipment management software for clubs and organizations

RocNest is a free web application that helps sports clubs manage their equipment inventory, bookings and loans. It is a project by [RocStatus.com](https://rocstatus.com).

## Key Features

- **Complete Inventory Control**: Track every piece of equipment with photos, categories, status and full usage history
- **Smart Booking System**: Members book equipment online with automatic availability checking and confirmation
- **Multi-Organization**: Manage multiple clubs, sections or branches from a single account
- **Safety Reviews**: Schedule periodic reviews with custom checklists and maintenance history
- **Advanced Security**: Encrypted data, role-based access control, and complete audit trail
- **100% Free Forever**: No hidden costs, no premium plans, no artificial limits

## Target Users

- Mountain clubs (mountaineering, hiking, trekking)
- Climbing clubs (sport climbing, bouldering, alpine)
- Running and trail running clubs
- Cycling clubs
- Skiing and snowboarding clubs
- Diving clubs
- Kayaking and canoeing clubs
- Sports federations
- Any organization managing shared sports equipment

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js, React, TypeScript, Prisma and Tailwind CSS
- Available in Spanish and English
- Web-based application accessible from any device
- Hosted on secure cloud infrastructure

## Links

- Website: https://rocnest.com
- Parent project: https://rocstatus.com
- Login: https://rocnest.com/login
- Register: https://rocnest.com/register

## Pricing

RocNest is completely free. There are no paid plans, no trial periods, and no feature restrictions.
